"Great work, excellent service and very reasonable prices." "This year we used our neighbor's pool service, Southlake Pools." "Now my main go to company for pool services in Southlake."

We have used Southlake Pools for years for pool maintenance and repairs and we are very happy with their service! They are very responsive and always quick to schedule our service call to repair any leaks and address any pump issues. This … More Response from the owner 4 months ago
Super Great review for Southlake Pools!!!  Thank you!!!

Southlake Pools is the best pool service I have experienced in 30 years.  Derek was truly 5 stars all the way! He is kind, extremely knowledgeable, and thoroughly professional. I’m so glad one of my patients recommended Southlake Pools — and getting to work with Derek was an added bonus! Response from the owner 4 months ago Derek is Amazing, just like this review!!!

I’ve used Southlake Pools for multiple repairs and services that I have needed over the years and have been happy with the level of service and pricing. They have always been easy to work with and have helped me get up and going, whether … More Response from the owner 4 months ago Thank you for your 5-star review!
